site.title: JavaScript library for declension of Ukrainian anthroponyms
site.description: Online declension of Ukrainian family names (last names), given names (first names), and patronymic names.
site.keywords: ukrainian language, anthroponym declension, personal name declension, given name declension, first name declension, patronymic name declension, patronymic declension, family name declension, surname declension, word declension, declension, word inflection, nominative case, genitive case, dative case, accusative case, ablative case, locative case, vocative case
contactMe.modalMessage: Please feel free to contact me via email if you have any questions or suggestions.
demo.message: declension of Ukrainian family names (last names), given names (first names), and patronymic names
gender.message.autoDetection: Automatic grammatical gender detection by first name or patronymic name.
gender.message.detectionFailed: Failed to detect grammatical gender by first name or patronymic name. Select grammatical gender manually.
declensionForm.instructionMessage: Select a grammatical gender and fill in a personal name in a nominative case
declensionForm.copyMessage: Use the buttons below to copy the declension results.
error404.instructionMessage: The requested page was not found
declensionForm.correctionNotice: Do you want to replace {incorrectSpelling} with {correctSpelling} according to the latest spelling rules?
